about_the_game:
One-hit kill & High-speed combat

Sa[meow]rai: Silverwing Stray is a top-down action-adventure game centered around one-hit kills and rich actions. Experience impactful futuristic visuals and intense battles.

Wield your weapons and parry attacks as you maneuver among ruthless foes, fighting for every second of survival.

Or make use of every tool at your disposal, manipulating electronic devices and mechanisms in the environment to create a situation to your advantage.

Hand-drawn comic-style cutscenes & Various storylines

Hand-drawn comic-style cutscenes are woven into the game, telling the story of a cyber vigilante haunted by past events and regret, embarking on a thrilling and solitary path of vengeance.

In this conspiracy-laden futuristic metropolis, tensions between the police and corporations are on the verge of eruption. You'll encounter a diverse cast of intriguing characters, each with their own unique traits.

Will you help them fulfill their desires, or betray them to achieve your own goals? Numerous story branches and hidden plots await your choices.

What kinds of weapons do the various factions and underworld figures entangled in war and conspiracy wield?

Follow the story and the guidance of different characters to uncover legendary weapons hidden throughout the world!

Can we go back to the past and mend what was wrong?

When the marks of the past remain vivid and alive, while reality is filled with regret and bloodstains.

Now, a plan to "return to the past" is laid before you—will you seize that faint glimmer of hope, no matter the cost?

Or will you let everything fade away, heading toward an unknown future?

About Developer

Gou Hong Studio is an independent game studio dedicated to combining unique visual styles with modern design concepts to develop impressive experiences for players.

About Publisher

GCORES PUBLISHING is an indie game publishing business established by GCORES. In the future, we will continue to bring you outstanding indie games from the BOOOM Game jam. Welcome to our publisher site for more information.

About BOOOM

The BOOOM Game jam is a game development event held twice a year, where participants are given three weeks to develop a game based on a specific theme. After the development phase, we host an online game festival where all players can try out the games, and these games are also showcased at the G-FUSION offline video game carnival.

short_description: "Sa[meow]rai" is a top down action role-playing game centered around one-hit kills and rich interactivity.You play as a law-enforcer with an implant called "Gyakugawa Emergency Reboot Device," fighting for every second of your remaining time in a morally ambiguous cyberpunk city.
